title: TweetWear
summary: Interact with Twitter from your wrist. #AndroidWear
description: See your timeline and your lists and update your status directly from your Android Wear watch.Features:* See your last 10 tweets from your timeline or your lists* Save links in tweets to read them later* Retweet, favorite them* Reply to them by voice* Post a new tweet* Show embedded images of tweetsTo start posting a new tweet, say 'Ok, Google' then 'Start New Tweet' and say the text for your tweet when prompted. You can also find the 'New Tweet' icon in your application list so you can start it from there.Big thanks to Diego De Barbieri and Евгений Дрямин for the translations!Expect more features to come. Bug reports and suggestions are welcome!Also, if you can help me with translations, please send me an email. Thanks!
descriptionHTML:
See your timeline and your lists and update your status directly from your Android Wear watch.

Features:
* See your last 10 tweets from your timeline or your lists
* Save links in tweets to read them later
* Retweet, favorite them
* Reply to them by voice
* Post a new tweet
* Show embedded images of tweets

To start posting a new tweet, say 'Ok, Google' then 'Start New Tweet' and say the text for your tweet when prompted. You can also find the 'New Tweet' icon in your application list so you can start it from there.

Big thanks to Diego De Barbieri and Евгений Дрямин for the translations!

Expect more features to come. Bug reports and suggestions are welcome!
Also, if you can help me with translations, please send me an email. Thanks!
comments: Great but... Is showing me tweets at least twice an hour with refresh set at every three? What am I missing? Great app. Asus zenwatch 2 with Samsung 6 marshmallow here. Edited: it settled down nicely. Terrific support. Love it.
Very Good This is App is very good, the only thing missing is the multiple twitter account option. Or am I missing something?

Great Does just what I was looking for. Tweets quick. Would like option to disable retrieving of tweets altogether though. I don't care to read tweets on my watch. Downloaded specifically to tweet from it.
This. Thank you for this. Thank you.
Awesome Perfect app, thanks for adding the vibration option!

Works very well Would it be possible to only send tweets from specific people to the Wear device? I follow a lot of people / companies but I don't necessarily want to see their tweets. If There was a list on the Phone where I could check or uncheck the people I wanted to send to the watch it would be perfect for me!
recentChanges: * 0.4.2: Read It Later: Archive saved pages
* 0.4.1: Read It Later: Save link in tweets to read them later on the phone
* 0.3.2: Option to disable vibration for notification
* 0.3.2: Option to mark tweets as read when notification is deleted
